Your Gateway to {clientName}'s UAE Free: Your Gateway to {clientName}'s UAE Free Zone Program
home.p1: As your IOR we are responsible for maintaining and archiving the books of records pertaining to customs clearance and documentation, as well as obtaining other required permits from regulatory authorities.
home.p2: We are a member of World Customs AEO and World Logistics Passport certificate holder, giving us prioritization privileges for customs inspection and clearance, post-clearance audits and online customs approval.
home.p3: Save time and money while improving the accuracy of your shipping plans and schedules.
home.p4: Our duties as your Importer of Record include completion and filing of necessary import documentation, accurate valuation of imported goods in line with local laws and the audit and implementation of necessary compliance tools.
By submitting this form, you agree to ou: By submitting this form, you agree to our
Follow the steps for an easy onboarding: Follow the steps for an easy onboarding process
Step1Text: As the first step please provide your company details so we can start sending you relevant material on the programme.
Step2Text: Sign up with RSA Global as your Importer/ Exporter of Record and enable shipments to Amazon's Fulfillment Center in the UAE Free Zone
Step3Text: Once you are officially enrolled, our team will contact you to guide with payment and shipping details.
Step4Text: After you have shared the shipping details, our team will provide the payment summary. Payment will be taken upfront, post which you can ship your shipment.
Step5Text: Once your consignment is shipped, provide pre-alert data to enable smooth customs clearance into UAE, and speedy delivery to Amazon's Fulfillment Center
This name will be used for all agreement: This name will be used for all agreement purposes
I Agree & I'm ready for e-sign: I Agree & I'm ready for e-sign
Please confirm that you have read and ag: Please confirm that you have read and agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
Please confirm that you have verified th: Please confirm that you have verified the agreement

allFAQs.qtn: Where is RSA located?
allFAQs.ans: RSA is headquartered in Dubai, UAE, with partners and offices around the world

allFAQs.qtn: What services can RSA provide?
allFAQs.ans: RSA can support you with IOR/EOR services, customs clearance, freight, storage and fulfillment

allFAQs.qtn: What is RSA's address?
allFAQs.ans:
Consignments for which RSA is IOR must be sent to:
RSA E-commerce and Digital Logistics DWC-LLC
Dubai Logistics City ( DWC)
Dubai South – United Arab Emirates
P.O.Box 644313, Dubai, U.A.E,
Mob : +971508548493 / +971554462208
CTC: Alexandro Posas / Russell Katipunan
EMAIL: ior.support@rsa.global

allFAQs.qtn: What is the responsibility of the IOR?
allFAQs.ans: The duties of an Importer of Record IOR include completion and filing of necessary import documentation, accurate valuation of imported goods in line with local laws and the audit and implementation of necessary compliance tools

allFAQs.qtn: How long does it take for RSA to activate services?
allFAQs.ans: Once you have signed the IOR agreement, RSA will activate service within 24 business hours

allFAQs.qtn: Who is the consignee if I am shipping to UAE?
allFAQs.ans: RSA E-commerce and Digital Logistics DWC-LLC

allFAQs.qtn: How can I check if my products are eligible for this program?
allFAQs.ans: General cargo goods are eligible for this program. To check your product eligibility, you can use the HS code database provided to you on email you once you sign up on the portal. This will tell you if your goods are restricted or not. Once you have finished enrollment by signing the agreement with RSA, you will receive log in credentials. You can then 'Look Up HS Codes' or 'Check Product Eligibility' in the portal as well.

allFAQs.qtn: What is IOR and EOR?
allFAQs.ans: IOR is Importer of Record; EOR is Exporter of Record

allFAQs.qtn: What are the advantages of enrolling in this program?
allFAQs.ans: Sending your goods to the free zone allows you to gain access to a customer base in the UAE and MENA markets without paying VAT or duty

allFAQs.qtn: How can I avail of RSA's freight services?
allFAQs.ans: Simply request a quote on the portal once you receive your log in credentials

allFAQs.qtn: What is the advantage of RSA's IOR services?
allFAQs.ans: We are a member of World Customs AEO and World Logistics Passport certificate holder, giving us prioritization privileges for customs inspection and clearance, post-clearance audits and online customs approval.

allFAQs.qtn: How much are the IOR service charges?
allFAQs.ans: Standalone IOR fees are $60 per shipment for all regions except China (please contact your account manager if you are shipping from China). You will also pay an additional clearance fee per shipment which is $35 per shipment if air freight is used; and up to $45 for FCL sea freight shipment

allFAQs.qtn: Can RSA provide me with the shipping labels?
allFAQs.ans: Yes, if RSA is your chosen freight forwarding agent

allFAQs.qtn: Who will take care of my packages when they arrive in Dubai?
allFAQs.ans: If RSA is your freight forwarding agent, we will take care of the goods end-to-end

allFAQs.qtn: Where will my products be stored and how can I get inventory visibility?
allFAQs.ans: Your products will be stored at DWC3 - Amazon's Fulfillment Center in the free zone. You can get inventory visibility on Amazon Seller Central

allFAQs.qtn: How long does it take for my shipment to get cleared once it arrives at UAE?
allFAQs.ans: Clearance will take up to 48 hours (unless inspection is required, for which we will keep you informed. But this is rarely required if the items have been declared correctly)

allFAQs.qtn: Do we have to pay the IOR fee for each shipment?
allFAQs.ans: Yes, payment for IOR and clearance has to be made upfront for each shipment

allFAQs.qtn: Does IOR fee depend on the size of the shipment?
allFAQs.ans: No, IOR fees are a flat amount and irrespective of size of shipment

allFAQs.qtn: What if I am using my own freight forwarding agent?
allFAQs.ans: You only pay IOR and clearance fees to RSA

allFAQs.qtn: What is RSA's Mirsal 2 import code?
allFAQs.ans: Mirsal 2: AE-1146354

allFAQs.qtn: Who will pay VAT on my sold goods?
allFAQs.ans: VAT is applied to the bill when your customer places an order on amazon.com

allFAQs.qtn: Are there any additional charges aside from IOR, BOE and carrier charges?
allFAQs.ans: No, only a processing fee for payments as per payment mode

allFAQs.qtn: Do we have to pay any duty or taxes when shipping goods?
allFAQs.ans: No, because you are shipping to a free zone

allFAQs.qtn: When do I make the payment?
allFAQs.ans: All payments need to be made prior to shipping your goods, and goods can only be shipped once RSA confirms payment receipt

allFAQs.qtn: What are my payment options?
allFAQs.ans: Credit card and bank transfer

allFAQs.qtn: What products can I import?
allFAQs.ans: General cargo goods are eligible for this program. For other categories, special permits need to be applied for.

allFAQs.qtn: What are the maximum sizes or weight allowed for me to ship?
allFAQs.ans:
Courier mode: Per Pcs weight should be 70Kgs and max dims is 100x100x100cm
Air Freight mode: max dims 200x300x155 LWH

allFAQs.qtn: Can RSA arrange shipping if my products are coming from a different origin point, and not where my company is based?
allFAQs.ans: Yes

allFAQs.qtn: What if I want to re-export to Saudi?
allFAQs.ans: This service is available through Amazon

allFAQs.qtn: Is RSA holding the inventory?
allFAQs.ans: No, the inventory is being stored at the Amazon fulfillment center in the free zone

allFAQs.qtn: Who handles the delivery and returns?
allFAQs.ans: Amazon will handle customer deliveries and returns. Returns to seller's origin country will have to be organized by the seller. RSA can support with shipping.

allFAQs.qtn: What is the difference between packing list and commercial invoice?
allFAQs.ans: The template that we require you to use are the same for the packing list and commercial invoice.

allFAQs.qtn: Do sellers need to provide commercial invoice digitally or printout?
allFAQs.ans: Shipments need to be accompanied with 3 printouts. For pre-alerts please share digital copies

allFAQs.qtn: How are IOR fees applied - is it by AWB?
allFAQs.ans: IOR fees to be paid per airwaybill (AWB). If your shipment is split into two AWBs you will have to pay 2 times the IOR fees
